A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was different. I didn’t know if I liked all of the decisions and see some missed opportunities\, but in the end we got a complex movie that subverted expectations\, leaves us not knowing where things are headed\, and gives us a lot to talk and think about. The more I think about the movie\, the more I enjoy it. There are few movies I ever want to see more than once in theaters\, especially at that length\, but I def want to see it again!
